references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concepts and framework upon which much of the subsequent research, including this paper, is built.

references.paper_title: A "parareal" in time discretization of PDE's
references.reason: This paper introduces the parareal algorithm, a foundational parallel-in-time integration method that directly inspired the core algorithmic approach of this paper.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces progressive distillation, a technique that is relevant to this paper as an alternative approach for improving the efficiency of diffusion sampling.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a highly influential and widely used diffusion model that is used as a benchmark in this paper.
This paper is a concurrent work that also explores parallel sampling methods for diffusion models, allowing for comparison of methodologies and results.
